sources.full: My Little Pony: Cutie Marks & Dragons DM Screen

book.name: My Little Pony: Cutie Marks & Dragons DM Screen
book.author: Hasbro

entries: A powerful magic known as the elements of harmony calls forth five unlikely friends.
Together they must use their unique powers to discover an ancient magic hidden within a lost realm of Equestria™.

entries.name: Mystaria™
entries: Seeks magic and mystery throughout the realm. She embraces each adventure as an opportunity to learn more about the wonders of the universe. Mystaria™ doesn't go anywhere without her books, but if she tries to put them in the wrong saddle bag it can lead to trouble.

entries.name: Shadow Star™
entries: Discovers creative solutions to any challenge she and her friends face. She uses {@skill stealth} and intellect the enthusiastically tackle the obstacles in her path... and to play pranks on her friends. You never know what new trick Shadow Star™ has hidden up her cloak.

entries.name: Valor Stronghoof™
entries: Will rush into battle should anyone threaten her friends. She uses her fierce strength and battle-worn {@item shield|PHB} to courageously defend the party. At the end of a long day, there is nothing Valor Stronghoof™ wants more than to see her friends safe and sharing a laugh around the fire.

entries.name: Spinner Talltail™
entries: she is joyfully seeking out her next story!
Sit down for a spell and she'll spin you a song;
her skill the the {@item lute|PHB} helps friends get along.
Spinner Talltail™ knows stories are better;
when friends gather 'round to share them together.

entries.name: Woodheart the Kind™
entries: Finds beauty in nature, no matter where the trail may lead. She loves each of the many companions the forest provides, especially her familiar Litteknight. Caring and thoughtful, Woodheart knows that a {@spell Goodberry} a day will keep this {@creature Almiraj|ToA} a loyal friend!
